mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LOGISTICS_INPUT_CHECK( RAW_MACHINE_ID, UNLOAD_POS, REMARK, CHECK_TIME, OPERATOR ) VALUES ( #{rawMachineId}, #{acceptPos}, #{remark}, #{checkTime}, #{operator} )
INSERT INTO TB_LOGISTICS_INPUT_CHECK_DE( RAW_MACHINE_ID, DATA_NO, DATA_NAME, AMOUNT ) VALUES ( #{rawMachineId}, #{dataNo}, #{dataName}, #{dataValue} )
INSERT INTO TB_LOGISTICS_INPUT_CHECK_PHOTO( RAW_MACHINE_ID, NO, PHOTO, CHECK_TYPE ) VALUES( #{rawMachineId}, #{no}, #{photo}, #{type} )
mapper.select: SELECT IC.RAW_MACHINE_ID, IC.UNLOAD_POS, IC.REMARK, IC.CHECK_TIME, IC.OPERATOR FROM TB_LOGISTICS_INPUT_CHECK IC WHERE IC.RAW_MACHINE_ID = #{rawMachineId}
SELECT ICD.RAW_MACHINE_ID, ICD.DATA_NO, ICD.DATA_NAME, ICD.AMOUNT FROM TB_LOGISTICS_INPUT_CHECK_DE ICD WHERE ICD.RAW_MACHINE_ID = #{rawMachineId} ORDER BY ICD.DATA_NO
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_LOGISTICS_INPUT_CHECK_DE T WHERE T.RAW_MACHINE_ID = #{rawMachineId}
DELETE FROM TB_LOGISTICS_INPUT_CHECK T WHERE T.RAW_MACHINE_ID = #{rawMachineId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LOGISTICS_INPUTCHECK_PERCHE( RAW_MACHINE_ID, IS_CHECKED ) VALUES( #{rawMachineId}, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT T.RAW_MACHINE_ID, T.NO, T.PHOTO FROM TB_LOGISTICS_INPUT_CHECK_PHOTO T WHERE T.RAW_MACHINE_ID = #{rawMachineId} AND T.NO = #{photoNo} AND T.CHECK_TYPE = 1
